title: Beyond the Gates (2016)

cast.name: Stu Jefferson
cast.character: Voice on the Phone /              Demon Voices       (voice)

overview: Two estranged brothers reunite at their missing father's video store to liquidate the property and sell off his assets. As they dig through the store, they find a VCR board game dubbed 'Beyond The Gates' that holds a connection to their father's disappearance and deadly consequences for anyone who plays it.
storyline: Two estranged brothers reunite at their missing father's video store to liquidate the property and sell off his assets. As they dig through the store, they find a VCR board game dubbed 'Beyond The Gates' that holds a connection to their father's disappearance and deadly consequences for anyone who plays it.
plot: Two estranged brothers reunite at their missing father's video store to clean out the property and sell his belongings. As they search the store, they stumble across a mysterious VCR board game called "Beyond the Gates" that holds a connection to the disappearance of their father and deadly consequences for anyone who plays it.
